subSections.title: Glyph origin
Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[worry]]
# to [[contract]] (an illness); to [[gain]]; to [[suffer]] from; to be [[afflicted]] with
# [[trouble]]; [[peril]]
